context.sceneDescription: A single cream-colored ceramic coffee mug with latte art sits in sharp focus on a warm wooden counter. The primary focus is this one mug - it never moves, never multiplies, never changes. In the blurred background, a single barista in a black apron pours from one consistent stainless steel pitcher (not a flask, not a coffee pot - always the same single pitcher).
context.motionDescription: The foreground mug remains absolutely still in place - it never moves, never multiplies. Steam rises naturally from the same mug. No additional cups appear.

sample-006-multichar.coherenceNotes: No artifacts or inconsistencies detected. The mug remains static and centered, steam rises naturally, and the barista pours from the same pitcher with smooth, continuous motion.
